attributes.action: pass a law that if a set number of the electorate (say 500,000) submit a petition that a mandatory referendum should be put to the country at the same time as the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When 500,000 or more electors of the country submit a petition to the government of the day, they should be forced to put the matter to the electorate at the same time as the next general election so as to assess the mood of the country.  The government should then be legally obliged to follow the expresssed wishes of the people and exact the necessary law.
This would be a true act of democracy.
